title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 104 - PUPIL RECORDS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 104 - PUPIL RECORDS
State Regulations
§ 104.1 - Pupil attendance recordkeeping
§ 104.2 - Academic records of pupils who attend upon instruction elsewhere than at public schools
§ 104.3 - Prohibition on inclusion of individual student scores on State administered standardized English language arts or mathematics assessments for grades three through eight

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 104

Statutory authority: Education Law, §207

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
